dt.t: the primordial {wi}fireball{/wi} associated with the beginning of the universe

dt: {bc}a brilliant meteor that may trail bright sparks
{bc}the highly luminous cloud of vapor and dust created by a nuclear explosion

shortdef: a ball of fire; also : something resembling such a ball
a brilliant meteor that may trail bright sparks
the highly luminous cloud of vapor and dust created by a nuclear explosion
